name: The Lava Kingdom
description:
This is my submission for the Krassjam 2 made in a total of 25 hours and it is a top down wave survival where you control a dragon to protect your kingdom. Your kingdom is the last barrier between the lava dimension and the over-world, if they break though your kingdom that will mean the end of the world as we know it.

Protect the wall between the castle and the enemy at all cost, even if the cost is your life.

CONTROLS

________________________

Ability controls are show in the game at the bottom middle of the screen.

Movement is controlled by just moving your mouse around.
